On July 31, 2023, at 00:29:58 UTC, the construction of the mining camp with the ID Mining_Camp_M250230427_4 was completed. This project involved several villagers, including Villager_M250230427_30, Villager_M250230427_54, and Villager_M250230427_56, who participated in the construction under the match ID M250230427. Following the completion, Villager_M250230427_56, along with Villager_M250230427_30 and Villager_M250230427_54, gathered gold at the same mining camp, continuing their involvement in the ongoing match M250230427.
